product_name: The North Face Half Dome T-Shirt - Boys'
long_description: Cool, color-popping style and comfortable fabric make The North Face Half Dome T-Shirt for boys an instant favorite. Soft, easy-care cotton fabric with a touch of organic cotton. 1x1 rib at collar. Screen-printed graphic at center front.
short_description: Cool, color-popping style and comfortable fabric make The North Face Half Dome T-Shirt for boys an instant favorite.
